da8fe946-dcb5-48f7-8c69-ea6989d24cab.name: Afflicted Casting (Flagellant's Blessing)
da8fe946-dcb5-48f7-8c69-ea6989d24cab.notes: Lower penalty to casting and bonuses to Will to avoid distraction from Pain and Shock

ab5952b5-c7d9-4581-b71a-23b3013d3f20.name: Afflicted Casting (Mystic's Stupor)
ab5952b5-c7d9-4581-b71a-23b3013d3f20.notes: Lower penalty to casting and bonuses to Will to avoid distraction from being tipsy, drunk or euphoric

b5f3b9a4-916c-4f48-afa5-b96c61a4b568.name: Attribute Substitution (@Spell@/@Attribute@)
b5f3b9a4-916c-4f48-afa5-b96c61a4b568.notes: Base a single spell on an attribute other than IQ

057b99cd-ab56-4d51-821a-d9066918cac1.name: Better Magic Items (@School@/@Type of Magic Items@)
057b99cd-ab56-4d51-821a-d9066918cac1.notes: enchanted items obtained through school are 50% of cost better

bdd3e072-4967-4dad-9868-fe7dd140263b.name: Blocking Spell Mastery (@Blocking Spell@)
bdd3e072-4967-4dad-9868-fe7dd140263b.notes: Can cast Blocking spells (p. B241) multiple times per turn, with penalties

5ded2019-c774-499a-80aa-c8ce117f0759.name: Combat Ceremony (@Spell@)
5ded2019-c774-499a-80aa-c8ce117f0759.notes: Can cast ceremonial spell in combat; must know spell at 15+

434abf70-56ab-4567-bfe0-55db03357e38.name: Continuous Ritual (@Spell@)
434abf70-56ab-4567-bfe0-55db03357e38.notes: Can keep Concentrating on the spell for multiple turns

2e29202e-94c9-4239-a150-4e657f3a760d.name: Convenience Casting (@Spell@)
2e29202e-94c9-4239-a150-4e657f3a760d.notes: Can cast a spell with no risk if doing mundane tasks

088927d5-3921-44a9-bf27-4933cc721c5b.name: Covenant of Rest
088927d5-3921-44a9-bf27-4933cc721c5b.notes: Cannot be summoned, reanimated or resurrected after death

38653e90-6c45-4151-8166-a9679c624d0f.name: Elixir Resistance (@Elixir@)
38653e90-6c45-4151-8166-a9679c624d0f.notes: Can resist an elixir or get Magery bonus to resistance if it already has one

30858829-6de4-411b-821a-3ccdc496c284.name: Extra Option, Astrological Ceremonies (@School@)
30858829-6de4-411b-821a-3ccdc496c284.notes: Use Astrological Modifiers (Thau p. 83-86) for all spells

572efd75-6c08-4236-aeb6-d7bd4f01c7df.name: Extra Option, Brute-Force Spell (@Spell@)
572efd75-6c08-4236-aeb6-d7bd4f01c7df.notes: Invoke Increased Effect Skill option (Thau 39) for one spell

1ef73b49-a556-4aba-bf65-e036b9135780.name: Extra Option, Flexible Ritual (@Spell@)
1ef73b49-a556-4aba-bf65-e036b9135780.notes: Can use Flexible Rituals rules (Thau 37) for a single spell

5294628b-22f8-47ca-9697-c3aab7820e29.name: Extra Option, Intimidating Curses
5294628b-22f8-47ca-9697-c3aab7820e29.notes: Can use Announcing Curses (Thau 226-227) with baneful Resisted spells

a3b27887-7d39-4f6e-923b-fae4045bbaa9.name: Extra Option, Knower of Names
a3b27887-7d39-4f6e-923b-fae4045bbaa9.notes: Can use bonuses for Names (Thau 245) when casting ceremonially

d9449b0b-c3c7-4329-ac56-47c351431529.name: Extra Option, Secret Material (@Material@)
d9449b0b-c3c7-4329-ac56-47c351431529.notes: Can use Materials for Wizards (Thau 96-98) for casting spells

8de4db9b-8770-40f5-b164-9354f25c9598.name: Extra Option, Speedy Enchantment
8de4db9b-8770-40f5-b164-9354f25c9598.notes: Can use variant enchantment scheme in Time and Reliability (Thau 108-109)

fc6ac02f-33c3-4947-b217-40c7700ac363.name: Extra Option, Stabilizing Skill (@Skill@, @College@)
fc6ac02f-33c3-4947-b217-40c7700ac363.notes: Can use mundane skill to avoid critical failures for one college (see Thau 40), must have skill at 15+

fac81cbe-352b-420f-a99c-8e77e14cc3c1.name: Far-Casting (@Spell@)
fac81cbe-352b-420f-a99c-8e77e14cc3c1.notes: Each level removes -1 of range penalty for that spell

c8445566-d31c-4eb5-a095-d887e8be6eac.name: Frightening Side Effects (@Spell@)
c8445566-d31c-4eb5-a095-d887e8be6eac.notes: Can use Intimidation against witnesses when spell incapacitates or kills someone

f5681135-d3c9-4747-b4d8-b1dfaf34eac5.name: Huge Subjects (@Spell@)
f5681135-d3c9-4747-b4d8-b1dfaf34eac5.notes: Subtract 1/level from target's SM (minimum 0) before multiplying cost

a04d4ab4-fe2c-449c-8b45-0635caec4c1f.name: Immunity to @Specific Hazard@
a04d4ab4-fe2c-449c-8b45-0635caec4c1f.notes: Immune to a very specific, damaging magical effect

a6ed9975-41b6-4a67-a45a-99f61118364b.name: Improvised Items
a6ed9975-41b6-4a67-a45a-99f61118364b.notes: Can use one Gizmo (B57) per game session for a single-use magic item containing a spell you know

e05b3541-c5eb-4f14-be1f-534d6df705e1.name: Improvised Magic (@School@)
e05b3541-c5eb-4f14-be1f-534d6df705e1.notes: Switches on Spell Defaults (Thau 38) for the magic style

c0f51321-0f75-4408-beeb-e425abac3dda.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Aid
c0f51321-0f75-4408-beeb-e425abac3dda.notes: Can perform First Aid without a kit

6859dfa2-b817-4f6d-82dd-f710f1983b6b.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Avatar
6859dfa2-b817-4f6d-82dd-f710f1983b6b.notes: When sending a message via spells, accompanied by clear image of yourself

66075d25-7818-429d-ab70-d6c6f0fd7a54.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Boost Enchantment
66075d25-7818-429d-ab70-d6c6f0fd7a54.notes: When casting spell using enchanted item, +1 to Power

c49bde12-c224-48a1-bb3c-bcaf1a2b44d2.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Controlled @Disadvantage@
c49bde12-c224-48a1-bb3c-bcaf1a2b44d2.notes: Can curse yourself with a specific disadvantage

9b93589f-157f-4b53-94ac-24d26cdbdd0e.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Eye of the Storm
9b93589f-157f-4b53-94ac-24d26cdbdd0e.notes: Bad weather affects you as one step less severe

64ecbe57-43ca-43b5-a838-1c23b3903459.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Filter
64ecbe57-43ca-43b5-a838-1c23b3903459.notes: +1 to HT rolls to resist respiratory agents, +2 if you only have to avoid distraction

f40e7f2c-332a-4b60-8a91-355817d3a0e6.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Friendly Undergrowth
f40e7f2c-332a-4b60-8a91-355817d3a0e6.notes: +1 in mundane Quick Contest when someone seeking your trail or hiding place in overgrown area

30f64914-e0cc-4d1b-8356-52ba4d2299e8.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Gate Experience
30f64914-e0cc-4d1b-8356-52ba4d2299e8.notes: Know when you've been teleported, traveled in time or entered another dimension

baf8eedf-a7fc-4819-8e14-5eaa1d776317.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Good with @Animal@
baf8eedf-a7fc-4819-8e14-5eaa1d776317.notes: Animal Empathy advantage for one specific species

1d165843-5acd-4795-8cc5-5eed400cd089.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Gut of the Dragon

f8f11825-dd04-481d-ad2c-22416d377a32.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Intuitive Illusionist
f8f11825-dd04-481d-ad2c-22416d377a32.notes: +1 on mundane Will rolls to disbelieve magical illusions, illusion Fight Checks and on IQ + Magery to sense permanent illusions

c67e9cc6-a3f3-44eb-82c1-b1cee7aa6418.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Kindle
c67e9cc6-a3f3-44eb-82c1-b1cee7aa6418.notes: Produce tiny flame with a touch

5b2f545e-65fe-4bf3-b03f-84e61dec391e.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Magical Analysis
5b2f545e-65fe-4bf3-b03f-84e61dec391e.notes: +1 to mundane attribute or skill rolls to analyze information from Information spell

66883d0d-6a66-4d0d-919d-1ad9a2b556c4.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Muffle
66883d0d-6a66-4d0d-919d-1ad9a2b556c4.notes: Ignore -1 in hearing penalties due to noise and +1 to HT to resist deafening effects

78407de8-6447-4826-96cd-d3741e7d077d.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Mystic Gesture
78407de8-6447-4826-96cd-d3741e7d077d.notes: Can open or close a door, light switch, tap or similar item with gesture and spend 1 FP

a8713928-caf5-4785-8428-7323a4d4563c.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Pebbles
a8713928-caf5-4785-8428-7323a4d4563c.notes: Can pull a small stone of appropriate size from soil, sand or rubble

6a781839-586f-4250-aff2-00bf823da414.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Reinforce
6a781839-586f-4250-aff2-00bf823da414.notes: Can shield personal possessions from magical destruction

a9202476-7ed8-4320-90d4-38bc28676375.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Rinse
a9202476-7ed8-4320-90d4-38bc28676375.notes: Can negate ongoing damage from Cyclic contact effects and extinguish flame by spending 1 FP

986c1ba0-8b56-45c1-a64e-19af164e7c0d.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Screen
986c1ba0-8b56-45c1-a64e-19af164e7c0d.notes: Ignore -1 in Vision penalties due to bright light and +1 to HT rolls to resist dazzling effects

aea92a80-d661-47ba-b6b2-ddddf4979e20.name: Intuitive Cantrip, Spark
aea92a80-d661-47ba-b6b2-ddddf4979e20.notes: +1 to mundane repair skills when maintaining or repairing technological items entirely through magic

d4dc157d-8bc8-46dd-976e-c5500ff7eb0d.name: Kill Switch (@Spell@)
d4dc157d-8bc8-46dd-976e-c5500ff7eb0d.notes: Can turn off ongoing spell with no cost

adc39281-a2e6-4762-aaf9-72ee633e3eed.name: Life-Force Burn
adc39281-a2e6-4762-aaf9-72ee633e3eed.notes: Ignore -1 per level of penalty when using Burning HP (B 237)

d57236bb-cfa0-4a39-846c-b0102c97680f.name: Limited Energy Reserve (@School@)
d57236bb-cfa0-4a39-846c-b0102c97680f.notes: Can use Energy Reserve (Pow 119) for your style's spells

044d68b4-fcca-4a7f-a6bf-b3c95b7d6159.name: Magical Style Adaptation (@School@)
044d68b4-fcca-4a7f-a6bf-b3c95b7d6159.notes: Can buy spells, perks, etc. of another style

10dbf56f-4186-4692-9b4e-a64890c9cea0.name: Magical Weapon Bond (@Specific Weapon Type@)
10dbf56f-4186-4692-9b4e-a64890c9cea0.notes: +1 to effective combat skill with attuned weapon

e9c2296a-aded-48aa-b53b-419e9768f783.name: Mana Compensation (@School@)
e9c2296a-aded-48aa-b53b-419e9768f783.notes: Penalty for casting in low mana area is 1 less

fa4aa913-b3c5-41c8-b05b-bb9f9275f0d9.name: Melee Spell Mastery (@Melee Spell@)
fa4aa913-b3c5-41c8-b05b-bb9f9275f0d9.notes: Can cast other spells while maintaining a Melee Spell at -3

a640b33f-6f31-41ec-bcbf-56dbb426d594.name: Mighty Spell (@Melee or Missile Spell@)
a640b33f-6f31-41ec-bcbf-56dbb426d594.notes: +2 damage or +1 damage per die when casting spell, costs 1 FP

58c9178b-655b-4296-9c1f-1e04d4a0c031.name: Missile Spell Mastery (@Missile Spell@)
58c9178b-655b-4296-9c1f-1e04d4a0c031.notes: Can cast other spells while holding missile spell, at -3 penalty as if Concentrating

6ecf6735-d891-49ef-8deb-1523b3a6555b.name: Mundane Magic (@Spell@ as @Skill@)
6ecf6735-d891-49ef-8deb-1523b3a6555b.notes: Can cast spell that appears to be use of mundane skill

b00aeaf8-3859-49c6-9e3e-8f7a6f75dab9.name: Named Possession (@Item@)
b00aeaf8-3859-49c6-9e3e-8f7a6f75dab9.notes: Item has potential to gain magical properties when you perform deeds of thaumatological significance

451ae794-8415-47f8-b019-bc9170a1d678.name: Obscure True Name
451ae794-8415-47f8-b019-bc9170a1d678.notes: Others cannot find your True Name through magical means

dba390e5-43ca-4417-a4cc-b39bd3b66e06.name: Power Casting (@Spell@)
dba390e5-43ca-4417-a4cc-b39bd3b66e06.notes: Add Power Casting level to Magery level for determining maximum energy expenditures

a057cc53-f0ec-4958-b941-346dca9fe4b3.name: Psychic Guidance (@Missile Spell@)
a057cc53-f0ec-4958-b941-346dca9fe4b3.notes: Can control spell with effective skill of spell instead of Innate Attack

7cabb779-cafc-43c0-902e-8cc1b14240ab.name: Quick and Focused
7cabb779-cafc-43c0-902e-8cc1b14240ab.notes: Ingore -1 penalty/level for using assistants or having non-assistants within 10 yds during Quick and Dirty enchantment (B481)

173caaae-08f5-4e79-803f-88e13b9c448f.name: Reduced Footprint (@Spell@)
173caaae-08f5-4e79-803f-88e13b9c448f.notes: Can ignore an instance of chosen spell as being 'on'

dc1bac85-7edd-4eff-8835-65849c150839.name: Rote Alchemy (@Elixir@)
dc1bac85-7edd-4eff-8835-65849c150839.notes: Can brew one specific elixir without knowing Alchemy

f1c9fb10-cd3e-4870-a7f1-5ff7dd0dc36a.name: Rule of 17 (@Resisted Spell@)
f1c9fb10-cd3e-4870-a7f1-5ff7dd0dc36a.notes: Can use effective skill higher than 16 when someone is resisting spell

b3712b69-65c9-4dc1-a051-815587af8158.name: Rules Exemption, Armored Casting (@Spell@)
b3712b69-65c9-4dc1-a051-815587af8158.notes: Allows spellcaster to ignore penalties for armor (see Thau 28) for specific spell

ecb303f4-45d2-4aac-a908-64bfc1631518.name: Rules Exemption, Fearless Magic (@School or Spell@))
ecb303f4-45d2-4aac-a908-64bfc1631518.notes: Can ignore rules for Fearsome Magic (Thau 32) for a school or no Fright Check for spell when casting

55415d3c-d851-450b-a842-c30efbc816c2.name: Sacrificial Blocking Spell (@Blocking Spell@)
55415d3c-d851-450b-a842-c30efbc816c2.notes: Can use Blocking spell to shield an ally

3b31b855-4549-4ce3-80ff-a2d78ae519ad.name: Sanctum
3b31b855-4549-4ce3-80ff-a2d78ae519ad.notes: Personal residence is a place of power

8494ae39-c575-4bb3-a4b9-eeb5201e13e5.name: Scroll-Reading (@Language@)
8494ae39-c575-4bb3-a4b9-eeb5201e13e5.notes: Can read and speak magical words of seleted language

0c969090-b7ce-48a1-b77a-470e5f94cad2.name: Secret Mage
0c969090-b7ce-48a1-b77a-470e5f94cad2.notes: When detected, your Magery and associated magical advantages and perks are "secret" traits

0f011a77-4681-46e3-9765-8633b829ee4c.name: Secret Spell (@Spell@)
0f011a77-4681-46e3-9765-8633b829ee4c.notes: Allows you to learn a spell that isn't on world's standard spell list

0c6a4b6f-8029-4fec-b030-2879fb58fe50.name: Secret Words
0c6a4b6f-8029-4fec-b030-2879fb58fe50.notes: Can use Secret Word(s) to give +1 to skill for a single casting per day

b18c6731-87c6-4036-97ec-b10266be165c.name: Shaman's Trance
b18c6731-87c6-4036-97ec-b10266be165c.notes: Can acquire Autotrance (B101) as a perk, giving +2 to all spells that deal with spirits, -2 to resist their powers and spells

6ab6bdc8-e4e6-4d36-b8ff-6d5c1bcaa781.name: Shortcut to Power (@Spell@)
6ab6bdc8-e4e6-4d36-b8ff-6d5c1bcaa781.notes: Waives spell prerequisites for chosen spell

6d940418-8606-42e8-bfd8-d2f2e1d5edff.name: Special Exercises (IQ)
6d940418-8606-42e8-bfd8-d2f2e1d5edff.notes: Each level lets you exceed your racial maximum IQ by one

3792733d-965e-4e6e-b462-6d35eb9f25e4.name: Special Exercises (Magery)
3792733d-965e-4e6e-b462-6d35eb9f25e4.notes: May exceed campaign limit on Magery by 1/level

d4dc6888-9028-4943-b613-b11a94dce11b.name: Special Exercises (Mana Enhancer)
d4dc6888-9028-4943-b613-b11a94dce11b.notes: Permits wizard to buy Mana Enhancer I (B68)

2bf7ae6b-fb4e-4416-8215-46764e5d673d.name: Special Exercises (Wild Talent)
2bf7ae6b-fb4e-4416-8215-46764e5d673d.notes: Allows caster to purchase Wild Talent (B99)

339a91f8-4da4-4ae9-9c9e-91eb2ccf0063.name: Special Exercises, (FP can exceed HT by 100%)
339a91f8-4da4-4ae9-9c9e-91eb2ccf0063.notes: Max FP limit is raised to 100% of HT

da0b0567-d8b0-4125-93b5-69efb537f9e0.name: Spell Bond (@Spell@)
da0b0567-d8b0-4125-93b5-69efb537f9e0.notes: +1 to cast a spell, but easier to detect

54fce80c-b06e-4fcc-b235-27a53529df60.name: Spell Resistance (@Resisted Spell@)
54fce80c-b06e-4fcc-b235-27a53529df60.notes: +3 to resistance rolls for selected spells

83083017-078f-483d-b0b5-d3108811a1e5.name: Spirit Contract (@Spirit@)
83083017-078f-483d-b0b5-d3108811a1e5.notes: Contract with a suitable spirit per Thau 90-94

f1c05dd3-41fb-4b0f-a48a-25cc86658dc0.name: Staff Attunement
f1c05dd3-41fb-4b0f-a48a-25cc86658dc0.notes: Any suitable item treated as if carrying Staff spell

a2c924e1-66d9-4172-a1e6-d8f2ca61b5af.name: Staff Bond (@Specific Staff@)
a2c924e1-66d9-4172-a1e6-d8f2ca61b5af.notes: When readied, may ignore -1 of current total penalty for spells 'on', if at least one was cast through bonded item

60bf5628-fb05-4af1-87e5-4280da0c7e01.name: Standard Operating Procedure, Magical Lawyer
60bf5628-fb05-4af1-87e5-4280da0c7e01.notes: Always use airtight wording with spells that require it

f259686c-9cf2-44f6-a289-a3b99fa57262.name: Standard Operating Procedure, Paraphernalia Pro
f259686c-9cf2-44f6-a289-a3b99fa57262.notes: Half ready time for Long Actions (see B383) that require items

7f5d8dc6-f9e2-4a69-9c60-61f4af3c2fe6.name: Standard Operating Procedure, Precision Recharger
7f5d8dc6-f9e2-4a69-9c60-61f4af3c2fe6.notes: Always park Powerstones far enough apart to allow them to recharge

0ac8f73c-239f-4797-b85a-d60b4fba8949.name: Super-Sympathy (@Area of Inanimate Object@)
0ac8f73c-239f-4797-b85a-d60b4fba8949.notes: May ignore up to -5 in total penalties for distance, being unable to see or touch subject and general unfamiliarity

125897f1-72f6-44d2-a724-a75ec2a5feb9.name: Thaumatological Doublespeak
125897f1-72f6-44d2-a724-a75ec2a5feb9.notes: May use Thaumatology skill as if it were Fast-Talk or Intimidation in some situations; requires Magery and Thaumatology 12+

4072885e-0dae-40f7-b958-bf9f7f14611f.name: Willful Casting
4072885e-0dae-40f7-b958-bf9f7f14611f.notes: Use Will-based spell roll to resist your magic being dispelled; requires Will greater than IQ

0ac43468-d3b7-4054-adca-4b4d763ba1b6.name: Wizardly Dabbler
0ac43468-d3b7-4054-adca-4b4d763ba1b6.notes: Able to cast up to 8 Hard Spells without learning them

7ad0c9fa-27da-4334-a1e5-fcb99b0306f4.name: Wizardly Garb
7ad0c9fa-27da-4334-a1e5-fcb99b0306f4.notes: Nonmagical ritual trappings aren't affected by damage or size changes
